revision.comment: Only in DECORATE the "Power" prefix may be omitted. Also, remove the listing of the powerups and link to the powerup page instead.
revision.text: <onlyinclude>{{#if:{{{norepeat|}}}|All the [[#Powerup{{!}}Powerup properties]], which they override, and in addition the following ones:|{{:Powerup properties}}}} * '''{{LE|Powerup.Type}}''' ''power_name'' :The type of powerup given when item is used. This must be the name of an {{Class|Powerup|existing powerup}}. In [[DECORATE]] only, when passing the powerup's name, the "Power" prefix is optional and may be left out.</onlyinclude> [[Category:Editing references]]
